pages.title: Botany Box Recipe
pages.text: $(#25228d)1 Bark Enforced Sproutling, 4 Pointed Dripstone, 1 Empty Seed Packet, 100 Sun value.

pages.title: â›¨ Barrier
pages.text: $(#25228d)Endurians are defensive plants that deal damage to zombies attacking them.

text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Deal 3 damage to Zombies that eat it.

$(br2)$(#bd951a)"When other plants talk about me, they say I'm too gruff. They say I'm difficult to approach, that I'm afraid to let others get too close to me. Also, I smell terrible," said Endurian. But deep down inside, he knows that he's so much more than that. He's also short-tempered.
